      • identifyDatabases

        public abstract void identifyDatabases()
        Identify what databases will be used with this app. This method should call addDatabase(...) for each database

      • addDatabase

        public void addDatabase(@Nonnull
                        android.content.Context context,
                        @Nonnull
                        String databaseName,
                        int version,
                        int viewsVersion)
        Add a standard SQLite database
        Parameters:
        context - Android Context (used to get database from context.getDatabasePath(databaseName))
        databaseName - Name of the database (DBTools reference name)
        version - Version of the database
        viewsVersion - Version of the database view

      • addDatabase

        public void addDatabase(@Nonnull
                        android.content.Context context,
                        @Nonnull
                        String databaseName,
                        @Nullable
                        String password,
                        int version,
                        int viewsVersion)
        Add a SQLCipher SQLite database. If the password is null, then a standard SQLite database will be used
        Parameters:
        context - Android Context (used to get database from context.getDatabasePath(databaseName))
        databaseName - Name of the database (DBTools reference name)
        password - Database password
        version - Version of the database
        viewsVersion - Version of the database view

      • addDatabase

        public void addDatabase(@Nonnull
                        String databaseName,
                        @Nonnull
                        String databasePath,
                        int version,
                        int viewsVersion)
        Add a SQLCipher SQLite database.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Name of the database (DBTools reference name)
        databasePath - Absolute path to database
        version - Version of the database
        viewsVersion - Version of the database view

      • addDatabase

        public void addDatabase(@Nonnull
                        String databaseName,
                        @Nonnull
                        String databasePath,
                        @Nullable
                        String password,
                        int version,
                        int viewsVersion)
        Add a SQLCipher SQLite database. If the password is null, then a standard SQLite database will be used
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Name of the database (DBTools reference name)
        databasePath - Absolute path to database
        password - Database password
        version - Version of the database
        viewsVersion - Version of the database view

        Parameters:

      • addAttachedDatabase

        public void addAttachedDatabase(@Nonnull
                                String databaseName,
                                @Nonnull
                                String primaryDatabaseName,
                                @Nonnull
                                List<String> attachedDatabaseNames)
        Add a attached standard SQLite database
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Name of the attached database (DBTools reference name)
        primaryDatabaseName - Primary Database name
        attachedDatabaseNames - Database names to be attached to Primary Database

        primaryDatabase - Primary Database

      • deleteDatabaseFiles

        public boolean deleteDatabaseFiles(@Nullable
                                   File file)
        Deletes a database including its journal file and other auxiliary files that may have been created by the database engine.
        Parameters:
        file - The database file path.
        Returns:
        True if the database was successfully deleted.
